name: Barbatos Ratatouille
description: A simple chowder with a long history. The ingredients are similarly traditional and simple. No matter where you are, a piping-hot chowder of this sort can always give you a sense of real and unsurpassed satisfaction.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Barbatos Ratatouille
suspicious.description: A simple chowder with a long history. Though the Anemo Archon is said to symbolize freedom, perhaps this dish has been a bit too liberal in the making. Perhaps the name Stormy Stew might be more fitting here.
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Barbatos Ratatouille
normal.description: A simple chowder with a long history. The ingredients are similarly traditional and simple. No matter where you are, a piping-hot chowder of this sort can always give you a sense of real and unsurpassed satisfaction.
normal.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Barbatos Ratatouille
delicious.description: A simple chowder with a long history. After much careful stewing, the flavors of three different vegetables have been blended to perfection. Like this, it is not hard to imagine why someone once called it "the best chowder I've ever tasted."
delicious.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

special.name: A Buoyant Breeze
special.description: Venti's specialty. Other than the Cecilia flowers used for decoration, the ingredients are no different from normal. But if you taste it carefully, you can taste the flavor of "a wind that brings hope and tiny twists of fate." Perhaps... this is exactly what he wants.
special.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 1800s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
